quote: Perseverance is the hard work you do after you get tired of doing the hard work you already did.

quote: Art, freedom and creativity will change society faster than politics.

quote: We would all like to vote for the best man but he is never a candidate.

name: Niccolo Machiavelli

name: John F. Kennedy

name: Aristotle

name: Mark Twain

name: Theodore Hesburgh

quote: In politics stupidity is not a handicap.

name: Aristotle

quote: A fool and his money are soon elected.
name: Will Rogers

name: Aesop

quote: In politics... never retreat, never retract... never admit a mistake.

name: Newt Gingrich

quote: An idea not coupled with action will never get any bigger than the brain cell it occupied.
name: Arnold H. Glasow

quote: Politics, as a practise, whatever its professions, has always been the systematic organization of hatreds.
name: Henry Adams

quote: I don't know anything about politics. I wouldn't put too much into my prediction on politics.
name: Norm MacDonald

quote: I'm into politics - I'm interested in the election and how pissed off people get.
name: Pauly Shore

quote: Forget sex or politics or religion, loneliness is the subject that clears out a room.
name: Douglas Coupland

quote: Good thing we've still got politics in Texas - finest form of free entertainment ever invented.
name: Molly Ivins

quote: The stakes they play for in politics are paper and money. The chips they play with are your life.
name: Molly Ivins

quote: I didn't come into politics to change the Labour Party. I came into politics to change the country.
name: Tony Blair

quote: A promising young man should go into politics so that he can go on promising for the rest of his life.
name: Robert Byrne

quote: As you make your bed, so you must lie in it.
name: Daniel J. Boorstin

quote: I think politics come out of psychology.
name: Bruce Springsteen

quote: Loyalty and friendship trumps politics for me.
name: Robert Kraft

quote: I mean if politics was my main motivation I would be doing politics. But I'm a filmmaker.
name: Michael Moore

quote: If American politics are too dirty for women to take part in, there's something wrong with American politics.
name: Edna Ferber

quote: We are pleased to dismiss politics as entirely corrupt, if not financially, intellectually.
name: Gore Vidal

quote: Friends, there is no Left in American politics.
name: Gore Vidal

quote: I'm quite content to spend my life helping young people find themselves. I've had my fill of politics.
name: Condoleezza Rice

quote: As a chef and activist, I'm particularly concerned with food politics issues such as the farm bill.
name: Marcus Samuelsson

quote: Politics is human beings; it's addition rather than subtraction.
name: Donald Rumsfeld

quote: In politics, every day is filled with numerous opportunities for serious error. Enjoy it.
name: Donald Rumsfeld

quote: In most places in the country, voting is looked upon as a right and a duty, but in Chicago it's a sport.
name: Dick Gregory

quote: Your every voter, as surely as your chief magistrate, exercises a public trust.
name: Grover Cleveland

quote: India has never played politics with national security.
name: Atal Bihari Vajpayee

quote: The regional parties have emerged as a strong force, and they, too, deserve a place in national politics.
name: Atal Bihari Vajpayee

quote: I am not a fan of politics.
name: Chris Kyle

quote: To those who have exhausted politics, nothing remains but abstract thought.
name: Honore de Balzac

quote: A war for a great principle ennobles a nation.
name: Albert Pike

quote: I'm not giving up politics entirely - I'm just giving up leadership of a political party.
name: Nigel Farage

quote: Republican politics can sometimes feel like you're walking into, you know, an Elks Club or bachelor party.
name: Kellyanne Conway

quote: At least there's a political input, but when you put on the robe, at that point the politics is over.
name: Stephen Breyer

quote: Politics and government are certainly among the most important of practical human interests.
name: P. T. Barnum

quote: Politics isn't about left versus right; it's about top versus bottom.
name: Jim Hightower

quote: The public seldom forgive twice.
name: Johann Kaspar Lavater

quote: We have, I fear, confused power with greatness.
name: Stewart Udall

quote: I don't really have funny things to say about politics. I wish I did, but I don't.
name: Janeane Garofalo

quote: Even with politics, stuff comes around again. Woody Guthrie would recognize America today.
name: Billy Bragg

quote: Conscience has no more to do with gallantry than it has with politics.
name: Richard Brinsley Sheridan

quote: Everything is politics.
name: Thomas Mann

quote: The good thing about the IMF is there is no European politics involved.
name: Mark Rutte

quote: An Independent is someone who wants to take the politics out of politics.
name: Adlai Stevenson I

quote: We mean by 'politics' the people's business - the most important business there is.
name: Adlai Stevenson I

quote: You help me, I'll help you. That's politics.
name: Terry McAuliffe

quote: Politics hates a vacuum. If it isn't filled with hope, someone will fill it with fear.
name: Naomi Klein

quote: Being political is an integral part of being Iranian. Our lives are defined by politics.
name: Shirin Neshat

quote: I can remember when Democrats believed that it was the duty of America to fight for freedom over tyranny.
name: Zell Miller

quote: Politics is a field where the choice lies constantly between two blunders.
name: John Morley

quote: I can't let important policy decisions hinge on the fact that an election is coming up every 90 days.
name: Gerhard Schroder

quote: I believe that it is an unchanging value of democracy that ends cannot justify the means in politics.
name: Park Geun-hye

quote: Some of the FDA's own scientists have charged that politics, not science, is behind the FDA's actions.
name: Joseph Crowley

quote: Hope springs eternal, even in politics.
name: Gwen Ifill

quote: In politics, a picture is worth a thousand words.
name: Kathleen Troia McFarland

quote: I don't want to pass a punitive law, or use politics as a vendetta.
name: Romano Prodi

quote: I know politics; I know the media.
name: Valerie Trierweiler

quote: Politics, as the word is commonly understood, are nothing but corruptions.
name: Jonathan Swift

quote: Ideology, politics and journalism, which luxuriate in failure, are impotent in the face of hope and joy.
name: P. J. O'Rourke

quote: Politics is the attempt to achieve power and prestige without merit.
name: P. J. O'Rourke

quote: Politics won't allow for the truth.
name: P. J. O'Rourke

quote: The Bible is very clear about one thing: Using politics to create fairness is a sin.
name: P. J. O'Rourke

quote: I think that humor has become a principle means of communication among Americans about politics.
name: P. J. O'Rourke

quote: People say, 'Oh, politics is so polarized today,' and I'm thinking... '1861, that was polarized.'
name: P. J. O'Rourke

quote: The best and brightest don't go into politics. The best and brightest are at Goldman Sachs.
name: P. J. O'Rourke

quote: Politics is the one field you don't age out of.
name: P. J. O'Rourke

quote: The more aspects of life that can be moved from private reign to public realm, the better it is for politics.
name: P. J. O'Rourke

quote: Politics is - once in a while - a forum for serious debate about political philosophy.
name: P. J. O'Rourke

quote: Is Bill Clinton so good at politics, or are other politicians so bad?
name: P. J. O'Rourke

quote: Turn on to politics, or politics will turn on you.
name: Ralph Nader

quote: I never saw anything funnier than Texas politics.
name: Molly Ivins

quote: Am I the only person covering politics who ever noticed that Newt Gingrich is actually a nincompoop?
name: Molly Ivins

quote: Republicans have nothing but bad ideas and Democrats have no ideas.
name: Lewis Black

quote: Conservatives define themselves in terms of what they oppose.
name: George Will

quote: War is not an independent phenomenon, but the continuation of politics by different means.
name: Carl von Clausewitz

quote: I would prefer not to be involved in party politics.
name: George Soros

quote: When governments become large, voters cannot exercise close oversight, otherwise known as political power.
name: Maggie Gallagher

quote: It's an honor putting art above politics. Politics can be seductive in terms of things reductive to the soul.
name: Robert Redford

quote: The politicians were talking themselves red, white and blue in the face.
name: Clare Boothe Luce

quote: The world is governed by opinion.
name: William Ellery Channing

quote: A conservative is one who admires radicals centuries after they're dead.
name: Leo Rosten

quote: You better take advantage of the good cigars. You don't get much else in that job.
name: Thomas P. O'Neill

quote: I don't want to force my politics on my readers.
name: John Grisham

quote: Good government is good politics.
name: Richard J. Daley

quote: After much prayerful consideration, I feel that I must say I have climbed my last political mountain.
name: George Wallace

quote: Politics is my hobby. Smut is my vocation.
name: Larry Flynt

quote: The military destabilised my government on politically motivated charges.
name: Benazir Bhutto

quote: The more I see of the representatives of the people, the more I admire my dogs.
name: Alphonse de Lamartine

quote: Their very conservatism is secondhand, and they don't know what they are conserving.
name: Robertson Davies

quote: It is our experience that political leaders do not always mean the opposite of what they say.
name: Abba Eban

quote: A week is a long time in politics.
name: Harold Wilson

quote: Television is democracy at its ugliest.
name: Paddy Chayefsky

quote: Our party is a diverse one, as is my home state of Illinois.
name: Dick Durbin

quote: We can find common ground in agreeing that politics have no room in foreign policy.
name: Pete Hoekstra

quote: And after I make a lot of money, I'll be able to afford running for office.
name: Christy Romano

quote: Frankly, I don't mind not being President. I just mind that someone else is.
name: Edward Kennedy

quote: Politics is the conspiracy of the unproductive but organized against the productive but unorganized.
name: Joseph Sobran

quote: I think it's a terrible shame that politics has become show business.
name: Sydney Pollack

quote: You cannot spend your way out of recession or borrow your way out of debt.
name: Daniel Hannan

quote: People want change but not too much change. Finding that balance is tricky for every politician.
name: Eleanor Clift

quote: I always voted at my party's call, and I never thought of thinking for myself at all.
name: William Gilbert

quote: It has been well said that a hungry man is more interested in four sandwiches than four freedoms.
name: Henry Cabot Lodge, Jr.

quote: A politician will do anything to keep his job - even become a patriot.
name: William Randolph

quote: A liberal is a man who is willing to spend somebody else's money.
name: Carter Glass
